Text: Serial works perfectly, you just have do DC from net before you try to upgrade to PRO. It will show you  ''cant find server'' or something error when you try it, but it still upgrades to PRO.

There is a small update after you install this version of program, so you have 2 choices: Install the update and lose your PRO status next time you restart PC and run the program, or don't install any updates. However, once the update turns your PRO into FREE, you can simply enter the key again while net is DC and be PRO again.  Also don't forget to disable automatic update in preferences. Cheers
Serial didn't work for me either

It works on Beta 3.0 as well~! (As long as you disconnect from the internet first!) I also suggest going into the auto-update settings and enabling a proxy with random letters to make sure it can't do the auto-update!

Guys, i dont know if this key is included on this torrent (sorry if it is) but posting it just in case, as it works with the latest version as well. It worked for me at least.

Just make sure u disconnect from the net first before u enter key!! 

Key is: 
A000D-DEBFE-DDDE2-ACBBB

Enjoyyy.

PS. Key was posted on comment section on other torrent by some guy called @atamemet so credit is for that dude, im just reposting it here. Spread it around, please.
